maps.name: VOID PATH
maps.start: Kha'bit, Rat Snake Sorcerer. Void Path coils. Prophecy: '11=1. The law binds.' The green glow suffocates. Move.

battles.desc: Hiss sounds. Snake Archer guards the 1st binding.
battles.win: Archer falls. '11 is free.' Path clear.

battles.desc: Shadow moves. Void Rats swarm to delete 1.
Labyrinth twists. Snake-Lion cubs guard node 4.
Prophecy echoes: 'Bind the limit.' Mice appear.
battles.win: Cult flees, tiles crack. '5 nodes secure.'
Snake-Lion falls. Portal to Null Limits opens.
